sentences.sContent: He stood on tiptoe and peeped through one of these windows.
sentences.sContent_eng: He stood on tiptoe and peeped through one of these windows.
sentences.sCn: 他立在一扇这样的窗子前面，踮起脚尖朝里看。

sentences.sContent: She slipped out of bed and tiptoed to the window.
sentences.sCn: 她溜下床，踮起脚尖走向窗户。

synos.tran: 踮着脚走的；偷偷摸摸的

phrases.pCn: 用脚尖地；急切地；悄悄地

trans.tranOther: to walk quietly and carefully on your toes, so that nobody hears you
If you tiptoe somewhere, you walk there very quietly without putting your heels on the floor when you walk

trans.tranCn: 踮着脚走的；偷偷摸摸的
